page.title: 14Children's Indoor Pastimes
page.content:
The children have a variety of indoor board games such as chess, Monopoly, Scrabble, Othello and draughts. These can be played when they are with friends. Otherwise, they use computer games, Lego, Scalectric cars, Action Man dolls for boys,and Cindy dolls for girls. Some enjoy using computers for more serious purposes, programming etc.
Drawing and painting, sewing and knitting, model making from kits are popular. Most children spend quite a lot of time watching television. Children's television programmes are on between 4-6 p.m. Children's books are very colourful and attractive and there are still some who become "bookworms" and want to do little else but read.
